title: CreditAccess Grameen, Jana Small Finance Bank receive income tax notices
description: The income tax demand was against a deduction claimed by the company. "The company is of the opinion that the said demand notice is based on incorrect facts and assumptions, and hence the management is confident of taking up this with the IT department explaining the full facts of the case," the company said in a regulatory filing to stock exchanges.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
